plot: The small town of Flåklypa is experiencing a great lack of snow. Therefore the inventor Reodor Felgen creates a snow machine to secure snowfall for the town. However, the machine falls into the wrong hands when it is obtained by a megalomaniacal news editor. Will the town enter a new ice age, or will it be saved in time?
title: Solan og Ludvig - Jul i Flåklypa
